data.title: Sails
authors: Contributors to Sea of Thieves Wiki
data.meta_description: Sails are Ship customization Items in Sea of Thieves. They are purchased at a Shipwright and equipped via a Ship Customization Chest. The main purpose of the Sails is to catch the Wind and move the Ship forward. Any Sails tied to a Mast can be Lowered and Raised at the Sail Length Cleat to pick...
data.text:
Image Name Source Cost Requires Set In-game description Affiliate Alliance Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Affiliate Alliance "With their skull and knot motif, these sails mark out members of an ocean-spanning pirate alliance who value friendship and fun above all." Ancestral Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Ancestral "The sails depict a forest spirit that will surely watch over and guard your ship." Aristocrat Sails Shipwright Shop 100 n/a Aristocrat "These sails are made from the finest silk. You're a pirate, not a barbarian." Athena's Fortune Inaugural Guardian Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Legendary "Your stunning haul of loot is worthy of recognition, so enjoy these legendary sails!" Athena's Fortune Inaugural Legend Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Legendary "You're clearly a Legend among Legends! These sails honour your unrivalled contribution." Azure Scout Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Azure Scout "Sails emblazoned with the motif of a tireless shark in pursuit of its prey." Barrel Bombardier Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Barrel Bombardier "Decorated with all sorts of combustible paraphernalia, these sails are bound to be a blast for all who sport them." Beachcomber's Bounty Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Beachcomber's Bounty "A testament to one pirate's sowing skills - these verdant sails are patched together from assorted foliage and the ragged remains of old sailing sheets." Bear & Bird Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Bear & Bird "Derived from a cave painting; the bear and bird have been beloved for a long time." Belle's Ritual Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Emerald sails proudly displayed by those who aided Belle as she attempted to prevent Flameheart's return." Black Phoenix Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Black Phoenix "The scorching heat of the phoenix's eternal flame has certainly taken its toll on these sails." Bleakheart Banshee Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Bleakheart Banshee "Mirroring the ornate gold detailing on a forgotten music box, these sails feel almost too lavish to unfurl." Blighted Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Blighted "The mark of the Trumbull, a ship whose crew claims they found a valley ravaged by undead monsters." Bone Crusher Sails Duke 40 Bone Crusher "When the skellies see you coming, they'll know you've got a bone to pick." Boreal Aurora Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Boreal Aurora "The cry of 'antlers aweigh!' goes up at the unfurling of these reindeer-inspired sails. Usually then followed by boos." Briggsy's Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Briggsy's "These sails bear the golden image of Captain Briggsy. Don't let vanity become your curse, too." Celestial Steed Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Celestial Steed "Proudly display the unicorn on your sails if you're equally as unique, mysterious and gorgeous." Collector's Barrel Bombardier Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Barrel Bombardier "These glowing sails capture that fleeting moment of calm before a Stronghold Keg blows you to kingdom come." Collector's Beachcomber's Bounty Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Beachcomber's Bounty "It's a marvel how a lone beachcomber managed to weave these sails out of nothing but some twigs, palm fronds and flower petals." Collector's Bear & Bird Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Bear & Bird "Let the spirit of the bear and bird keep your ship soaring across the waves." Collector's Bleakheart Banshee Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Bleakheart Banshee "You can embrace the tale of doomed love that inspired these sails, or tell your own and hope the spirits don't take offence..." Collector's Blighted Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Blighted "These fearsome sails might make pirates take the potential doomsday threat of the undead seriously." Collector's Boreal Aurora Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Boreal Aurora "Often raised for the Festival of Giving, the sight of these multicoloured sails is a signal to start wrapping presents." Collector's Cursed Ferryman Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Cursed Ferryman "Has your ship risen from under the waves? It would explain these seaweed-coated sails." Collector's Cutthroat Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Cutthroat "Such foreboding sails surely belong to a crew of marauders with a killer reputation." Collector's Dark Warsmith Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Dark Warsmith "Don't look too closely at the intricate design of these sails. The devil is in the details." Collector's Elemental Power Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Elemental Power "Tales are told of an exotic royal family who lived in a beautiful realm, as vivid as these sails." Collector's Eternal Freedom Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Eternal Freedom "Ragged sails that have travelled to so many cursed locations, they themselves are slightly ethereal." Collector's Fightin' Frogs Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Fightin' Frogs "These sails announce your amphibious appreciation to the sea, the sky, the stars and beyond!" Collector's Frozen Horizon Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Frozen Horizon "Everyone will know winter is coming when they spy these glorious sails on the horizon." Collector's Graveyard Gladiator Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Graveyard Gladiator "The gates of the fighters' entrance to the amphitheatre are forever raised for you now. Unending battle awaits!" Collector's Huntress Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Huntress "This crosshair motif will inspire your crew to practise their aim - hopefully on other crews." Collector's Islehopper Outlaw Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Islehopper Outlaw "Crews sporting these sails with a spiked skull and barbed hook design want you to know how mean and tough they are." Collector's Lionfish Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Lionfish "Adorned with the golden visage of a lionfish, the approach of these sails should hurry you to roll out the red carpet." Collector's Lodestar Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Lodestar "A patchwork of shining moons and twinkling stars, these sparkling sails capture the beauty of the night sky." Collector's Lunar Festival Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Lunar Festival "Strong, noble and reliable, these special Lunar Festival sails herald the Year of the Ox." Collector's Mandrake Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Mandrake "These sails depict the predatory power of the mandrake in full bloom, terrifying other crews even in the dead of night." Collector's Night Wulf Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Night Wulf "If you see these claw marks on a tree or rock, do not go into the jungle after dark..." Collector's Paradise Garden Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Paradise Garden "These bright colours pay homage to the mythical Paradise Garden, where it's always party time!" Collector's Prehistoric Plunderer Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Prehistoric Plunderer "Frayed and tattered, these sails looks like they've barely survived an encounter with a monstrous creature from eons ago." Collector's Rogue Tinkerer Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Rogue Tinkerer "Sails befitting a crew who truly take pride in the craftmanship of all that they improve." Collector's Royal Revenge Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Royal Revenge "These sails have been restored to their former glory and now gleam as you sail. Try to avoid being lashed to the mast." Collector's Royal Sea Squirrel Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Royal Sea Squirrel "Legend says that the story of a squirrel becoming king all took place on one very bad day." Collector's Ruby Splashtail Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Ruby Splashtail "Go the extra mile for the Splashtail, since they go the extra mile to end up on your stove." Collector's Sea of Sands Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Sea of Sands "Sails glowing with the power of the fabled genie, but the only wish they grant is to look amazing." Collector's Shining Pegasus Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Shining Pegasus "Passers-by are bound to take a shine to these glinting sails adorned with florious pegasus motif." Collector's Shrouded Ghost Hunter Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Shrouded Ghost Hunter "A starkly-coloured set of sails that will terrify any foe, let alone that elusive megalodon." Collector's Soulflame Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Soulflame "The mask of a Soulflame Captain glowers balefully down from these scary sails." Collector's Spring Blossom Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Spring Blossom "Bearing the golden sigil of an eastern emperor, this royal regalia should impress even the haughtiest of helmsmen." Collector's Thunderous Fury Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Thunderous Fury "While it makes for a striking sail design, under no circumstances should you try to grasp a thunderbolt." Collector's Wrecker Wrangler Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Wrecker Wrangler "Sails that evoke only the most exciting deep sea diving sessions: those where you nearly get a leg bitten off at the knee." Crimson Crypt Collector's Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Crimson Crypt "You’d be forgiven for imagining a grandiose pipe organ solo and crash of thunder when a ship unfurls these sails." Crimson Crypt Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Crimson Crypt "As stone ships aren’t seaworthy, these sails are the closest you’ll get to seeing a cathedral’s vaulted windows on the ocean." Cursed Captain's Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Cursed Captain's "Glowing sails flown by a ship of dark deeds. Hopefully your crew will enjoy a brighter future." Cursed Ferryman Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Cursed Ferryman "Sails emblazoned with the tormented faces of long-forsaken souls who made a dark bargain." Cutthroat Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Cutthroat "Make these letters signify whatever you like, from Keelhaul Incident to Kissing Invitation." Dark Warsmith Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Dark Warsmith "Sails particularly suited for sailing through The Devil's Roar - but maybe not the Devil's Shroud." Dauntless Adventurer Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics Deckhand Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Your tireless efforts ensures our community sails on the right heading. May fair winds fill these!" Duke Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Duke "Duke claims that this X-like, multicolour design came to him in a grog-fuelled dream." Elemental Power Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Elemental Power "These sails hint at the myth of a flying princess who fought an evil troll. It is only a fairytale?" Eternal Freedom Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Eternal Freedom "These sails have seen more than their fair share of adventures, but remain an imposing sight." Fearless Bone Crusher Sails Shipwright Shop 100 n/a Fearless Bone Crusher "When the skellies see you coming, they’ll know you’ve got a bone to pick." Festival of the Damned Sails Duke 40 n/a Festival of the Damned "These damned sails are damned impressive, show them off to your damned friends!" Fightin' Frogs Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Fightin' Frogs "These sails were created by three friends, famous for their fighting skills... and skin conditions." Flaming Jackal Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Flaming Jackal "Sails emblazoned with a fiery cutlass to cut a swathe across the seas." Forsaken Ashes Sails Duke 40 Forsaken Ashes "These sails may not be fire resistant, but they show that your crew can stand the heat." Frozen Horizon Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Frozen Horizon "Icy sails billowing in the breeze make it feel like the winds of winter have arrived." Gilded Phoenix Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Gilded Phoenix "At full billow, the phoenix almost seems to take flight. Now is your time to shine!" Glitterbeard's Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Glitterbeard "Sails commemorating the adventures of Glitterbeard, flown in the spirit of harmony and discovery." Gold Hoarders Inaugural Captain Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Gold Hoarders "You gathered more gold than any other... you've earned supreme bragging rights, Hoarder!" Gold Hoarders Inaugural Marauder Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Gold Hoarders "You're no ordinary gold-grabber! These sails are yours to display." Golden Banana Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Golden Banana "These sails really declare your love of bananas! People might think monkey's are aboard." Golden Chaser Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Golden Chaser "Sails emblazoned with a scorching sun, lighting the path to victory." Golden Hour Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a

Golden Legendary "With proud mark shining bright at night, these Legendary Sails give foes a fright." Golden Nile Collector's Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Golden Nile "Sharks have had it easy for too long - unfurl these sails to bring some crocodile competition." Golden Nile Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Golden Nile "Whether on calm waters or roiling ocean waves, these sails will carry you onward to adventure." Golden Skull Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Bearing a gilded skull-and-swords motif, these sails will instil fear and envy into all you meet." Good Boy Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Good Boy "Sails emblazoned with the visage of a loyal canine companion." Graveyard Gladiator Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Graveyard Gladiator "A constant reminder that you may be cut or even killed, but your warrior's heart will always beat again." Huntress Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Huntress "Legend says this mark belonged to a secretive Trading Company that trained elite warriors." Islehopper Outlaw Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Islehopper Outlaw "Glow-in-the-dark outfits? A blatant disregard for authority? Nail down your valuables if you spy a crew with these sails." Jack O' Looter Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Jack O' Looter "Translating the myth of the Jack O' Looter's pumpkin ship into a functional vessel takes some doing." Legacy of Golden Sands Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Awarded to pirates who helped decide the ultimate fate of Golden Sands Outpost. The legend lives on...." Lionfish Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Lionfish "Gold, red, blue AND purple: someone spent a pretty penny on dye to make these majestic sails." Lodestar Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Lodestar "Emblazoned with a golden compass, these navy sails are the favourite of cosmic cartographers." Loot 'n' Lore Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "The games never end for a certain loudmouth bandit who loves to challenge your pirate knowledge!" Lord Guardian Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Sails of a would-be pirate king." Lucky Rover Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Lucky Rover "Sails emblazoned with a four-leaf palm tree design. Will they bring you luck?" Lunar Festival Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Lunar Festival "Fair winds and fortune are the goals of those who sport these fan favourite sails." Magpie's Glory Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Legendary Spirit "The Pirate Lord himself specified the unusual, swirling design on these sails, but refused to be drawn upon its meaning." Magpie’s Fortune Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Standalone Cosmetics "Like any good ship, the Magpie’s Fortune proved to be a starting point for a great adventure." Mandrake Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Mandrake "Descend upon other ships like a rolling tide of briars, teeth, and thorns. Plants are so calming." Masked Renegade Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Masked Renegade "These bold sails make it abundantly clear who it is that other crews are about to deal with..." Mayhem Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Mayhem "Sails once used by famed treasure hunters who disappeared. Perhaps they opened Pandora's Box?" Mercenary Sails Duke 25 Mercenary "The scorpion is a fine motif for a mercenary like yourself - you strike hard, fast and once." Merchant Alliance Inaugural Admiral Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Merchant Alliance "Performance is everything. Hoist these sails proudly for out-earning all your competition." Merchant Alliance Inaugural Commander Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Merchant Alliance "Your prompt deliveries have earned you this special reward." Merchant Ambassador Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Merchant Ambassador "Pristine sails fashioned from exotic silks. Useful when ferrying... exotic silks." Morningstar Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Morningstar "The Morningstar will rise once again with these bold sails, leading any crew to fortune and adventure." Mutinous Fist Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Mutinous Fist "The mark of the Mutinous Fist, a band of pirates who rebelled against the Pirate Lord's rule." Night Wulf Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Night Wulf "These fearsome claw marks will frighten superstitious pirates wary of the unkillable Wulf." Noble Pathfinder Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Standalone Cosmetics "This item was sold to support a great cause, with the proceeds going to SpecialEffect (www.specialeffect.org.uk). Visit www.seaofthieves.com/charities for terms and conditions." Noble Spartan Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Spartan "When the odds seem insurmountable, remember the endless determination of the Spartan Warrior." Notorious Arena League Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "When you become notorious, these sails will ensure that your victories are recognised." Obsidian Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Black Dog "Emerald sails filled with menace, for crews who are as dapper as they are dark." Omen Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Omen "A terrifying black-and-crimson skull adorns these sails, an omen of both glory and destruction." Order of Souls Inaugural Chief Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Order of Souls "You're quite the skull taker and should proudly show our colours." Order of Souls Inaugural Grandee Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "None other has provided so much for the Order. These sails befit your stature!" Overachiever Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "These sails belonged to the crew of "The Overachiever", a ship that beat impossible odds!" Paradise Garden Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Paradise Garden "Nobody will miss your ship with sails like this! Do you feel the urge to party?" Prehistoric Plunderer Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Prehistoric Plunderer "The pirate palaeontologists who raise these sails are known for 'delicate' excavations using Stronghold Gunpowder Barrels." Prosperous Captain's Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Sails inspired by the decadent dark wood and opulent ornamentation of a valuable Captain's Chest. Flash that cache!" Quartermaster Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Quellers of anger and quieters of discord, the peacekeepers beneath thes bright sails are devoted to making the seas a more civil place." Rare Crew Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Sail far beyond the seas to find the tiny Twycross outpost, home of the most scurvy pirates." Ravenwood Collector's Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Ravenwood "No harm in adding a little colour to the assassins' classic black, as long as it stays on brand." Ravenwood Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Ravenwood "Soar across the ocean on elegant wings, but don't expect anyone to wave to a ship full of assassins." Reaper's Bones Inaugural Keeper Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Reaper's Bones "Your work is a credit to yourself and the Reaper's Bones - show our colours with pride." Reaper's Bones Inaugural Master Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Reaper's Bones "These sails are only given to our most glorious Reapers. Exemplary work!" Reaper’s Mark Sails Pirate Emporium 499 n/a Standalone Cosmetics "It's said this symbol has special significance to the Pirate Lord, but also to all bold pirates!" Reapers' Ritual Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Ruby sails proudly displayed by those who aided The Reaper's Bones in their ritual to resurrect Flameheart." Regal Hound Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Regal Hound "Sails emblazoned with a crown. Just don't expect to rule the waves uncontested..." Relic of Darkness Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Relic of Darkness "Madame Olivia prophesies a profitable journey for any ship adorned with these sails." Rogue Tinkerer Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Rogue Tinkerer "Striking sails emblazoned with twin hammers, signifying a ship of born builders is sailing the seas." Royal Revenge Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Royal Revenge "These sails have been faded by the sun thanks to long years at sea, and have witnessed many wicked deeds." Royal Sea Squirrel Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Royal Sea Squirrel "The crown and tankards encourage drinking with dignity. Or is it drinking with stolen jewellery?" Ruby Splashtail Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Ruby Splashtail "Honour the Splashtail with sails that depict the piscine pal that pirates love to hate." Sails of Ancient Gold Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Ancient Gold "A set of sails themed around some of the oldest riches recorded on the Sea of Thieves." Sails of Cursed Bone Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Cursed Bone "The Hourglass of Fate reminds all those who spy it that the time has come to pick a side." Sails of Dark Relics Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Dark Relics "Flying sails that depict the ominous Bewitching Doll is unlikely to earn you the trust of other crews. But who needs trust?" Sails of Hope Ship Customisation Chest $6.38 USD n/a Standalone Cosmetics "This item was sold to support a great cause, with most or all of the proceeds (depending on point of purchase) going towards Great Ormond Street Hospital Children's Charity (www.gosh.org). Visit www.seaofthieves.com/charities for terms and conditions." Sails of Perilous Seas Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Perilous Seas "No matter how dangerous the ocean may be, these trusty sales will always carry you through tough times." Sails of Sharing Ship Customisation Chest $5.99 USD n/a Standalone Cosmetics "This item was sold to support a great cause, with most or all of the proceeds (depending on point of purchase) going towards No Kid Hungry (www.nokidhungry.org). Visit www.seaofthieves.com/charities for terms and conditions." Sails of the Ancient Warrior Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Colourful sails that depict the Ancients and their war against the Sirens through striking designs." Sails of the Ashen Dragon Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

Ashen Dragon "These scorched sails will strike terror into those pirates who know the tale of the Ashen Fleet." Sails of the Blue Horizon Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Blue Horizon "What adventures await at the point where the sky meets the sea? Unfurl your sails and see for yourself." Sails of the Bonny Belle Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Sails from a vessel captained by the notorious Sally Marshall as she struggled to make amends for past misdeeds..." Sails of the Ocean Deep Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Ocean Deep "Tridents and scale motifs pay tribute to the merfolk, who are sure to appreciate the gesture if they return you to your ship." Sails of the Siren's Wrath Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Siren's Wrath "You’ll have no cause for sorrow when these vibrant, Siren-themed sails carry you onward." Sails of the Wailing Barnacle Duke 40 n/a Wailing Barnacle "Sails designed for true sea-lovers, especially those that don't mind seeing the bottom of it!" Sails of Union Ship Customisation Chest $5.99 USD n/a Standalone Cosmetics "This item was sold to support a great cause, with most or all of the proceeds (depending on point of purchase) going towards Stand Up To Cancer (www.standuptocancer.org). Visit www.seaofthieves.com/charities for terms and conditions." Sapphire Blade Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Sapphire Blade "The distinct compass marks this vessel and its crew as those who lead the way for others." Saviour of Golden Sands Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Sails hand-made from Sharon's Sailcloth, awarded to those who fought to save Golden Sands Outpost." Sea of Champions Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Pirates with true competitive spirit know that the Sea of Thieves is in fact a Sea of Champions!" Sea of Sands Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Sea of Sands "The genie's oil lamp is a symbol of the desert lands where the only waves are sand dunes." Shining Pegasus Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Shining Pegasus "Unfurl these pastel-coloured sails and you're bound to feel the wind beneath your wings." Shroudbreaker Sail Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Shroudbreaker "A Season One design celebrating the sought-after Shroudbreaker, used to reach the Shores of Gold." Shrouded Ghost Hunter Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Shrouded Ghost Hunter "Bold, dramatic sails that also provide a handy reminder of what you're hunting." Soaring Gilded Phoenix Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Gilded Phoenix "Sails designed by a crew who just love to get creative between bouts of drinking and fighting." Soulflame Sails Pirate Emporium 799 n/a Soulflame "Sails emblazoned with an image of the Well of Fates. Perfect for any aspiring soul collector." Spartan Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Spartan "Sails bearing the striking eagle of a noble alliance. Their motto: By Sea, By Land, By the Stars!" Spring Blossom Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Spring Blossom "With their golden flowers and bright pink cloth, these floral sails are bound to win you 'Best in Show'." The Ancient Isles Sail Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Cursed Sails "Support The Ancient Isles, from Plunder Outpost to the Ancient Spire." The Inevitable Reaper Sails Duke 50 Reaper "Let it be known that there's no escaping the reaper... and the reaper is you." n/a

n/a Cursed Sails "Represent The Shores of Plenty in battle. No death in paradise today!" The Wandering Reaper Sail Duke 20 Reaper "With a ghasly white reaper against a black field, this sails surely spells death for any pirate who sees it approaching." The Wilds Sail Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Cursed Sails "Show the world that you're fighting for The Wilds. Yes, even Shipwreck Bay." Thunderous Fury Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Thunderous Fury "Pirates usually prefer lightning to strike far away from their ship's mast. These sails are the exception." Tribute Peak Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a

n/a Twilight Hunter "Let your deadly intentions be known with this mean-looking sail." Valiant Corsair Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Valiant Corsair "A striking depiction of known dangers that will never curb your hunger for sailing the Sea of Thieves." Valiant Dawn Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Standalone Cosmetics "This item was sold to support a great cause, with the proceeds going to St. Jude Children's Research Hospital. (www.stjude.org ). Visit www.seaofthieves.com/charities for terms and conditions." Vanguard Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Standalone Cosmetics "Show others the courage you displayed in being amongst the earliest to sail into mysterious waters." White Sailor Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a Sailor "Want to remain anonymous on the seas? Unfurl this mundane sail, no-one will remember it." Wild Rose Sails Shipwright Shop 100 n/a Wild Rose "The memory of Wild Rose will forever be honoured by the crimson bloom on these exquisite sails." Wrecker Wrangler Sails Pirate Emporium 599 n/a Wrecker Wrangler "A declaration of enthusiasm for deep sea diving, which doubles as a dire warning to drop anchor and be boarded." X Marks the Spot Sails Ship Customisation Chest

n/a

n/a X Marks the Spot "It's believed that 10 million pirates have sailed these seas. Maybe they buried some treasure?" The Killer Whale Sails The Hunter's Call 2,100 The Killer Whale "The Killer Whale bore these sea-monster sails, a move commonly known as 'tempting fate'." Black Sailor Sails Shipwright Shop 4,900 n/a Sailor "Are they black, or really, really dark grey?"
